AboutMe.title: Profile
AboutMe.description: I'm Alan Kevin Corman Samanamud. My curiosity about computer science started at 8 years old, with my first PC a Pentium 4.
AboutMe.description2: Developer with more than 3 years of experience. I worked in multidisciplinary teams in international projects.
AboutMe.description3: Some of the most significant challenges were working together with Pomelo in their web, a fintech in Argentina with high impact, and in the development of an SaaS for the management of events.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: My professional career began in 2023. Since then, I have worked in various companies, both international and Argentine, where I have been able to apply my knowledge and continue learning every day.

workingExperience.title: FrontEnd Developer
workingExperience.description: I'm part of the web development team, where I am responsible for creating and maintaining web applications using React and TypeScript. I work in an agile environment, collaborating closely with designers and other developers to create suitable and efficient user experiences.

workingExperience.title: FrontEnd Developer
workingExperience.description: I was part of a multidisciplinary team in the IT area, developing digital solutions focused on festivals, SPAs, and mobile applications.
workingKeys: Developed a SaaS to manage personnel and events from a Backoffice
Built a TypeScript library for managing schedules and events, published on NPM and used by various projects

workingExperience.title: FullStack Developer
workingExperience.description: Developed a backoffice for stock management and food distribution using React and NodeJS.
workingKeys: Developed an efficient stock management system, optimizing food distribution processes
Implemented a user-friendly interface for real-time stock monitoring and management

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: These are my completed projects, I look forward to your feedback!

cards.title: Boom Festival
cards.description: As part of the Muvinai team, I developed the website for Boom Festival, an international event that brings together multiple artits and attendees in Portugal.

cards.title: Game Center
cards.description: A web app featuring three interactive games: Memotest, WPM, and Pokémon Finder.

cards.title: Pomodoro App
cards.description: A customizable Pomodoro-style timer built as a web application.

cards.title: Crypto Cards
cards.description: A web app that fetches real-time cryptocurrency data from the CoinGecko API and displays it in a card-based layout.

Footer.title: Thank you for making it this far! If you have any proposals, feel free to reach out.

Chatbot.default: I'm actually not Kevin, I'm an AI. Please rephrase your question.
Chatbot.intro: Hi, how are you? I'm Kevin Corman, FrontEnd developer.
Chatbot.personal: I was born in Lima, Peru, currently living in Buenos Aires, Argentina. I work full-time as a FrontEnd developer.
Chatbot.contact3: I have several projects on my
Chatbot.contact4: for you to take a look at.
Chatbot.skills: My work technology stack includes React, MaterialUI, and React Admin. Personally, I often use TypeScript along with TailwindCSS instead. I also use tools like Jira, Figma, and Git. Currently, I'm studying NextJs.
Chatbot.experience: I have 1 year of work experience in web development, I have worked in international as well as Argentine companies, and I currently hold the position of FrontEnd Developer.
